Thompson points out that, as a British unknown looking for American fame, Simon Cowell used meanness as a savvy PR move- one that wouldn't work for Jennifer Lopez or Steven Tyler . Outside of the music industry, no one in the United States knew who Simon Cowell was until he started making nasty comments during the first season promotions for the show, he says. "Being mean was what made him a celebrity. But Steven Tyler and Jennifer Lopez are already celebrities. They have their cultural equity to protect." For Young, it's no accident that

Se a Mirafiori vince il no con il 51% la Fiat non farÃ l'investimento. Parla chiaro Sergio Marchionne nel primo giorno di quotazioni in borsa della nuova Fiat che si sdoppia nel settore delle auto, con la denominazione Fiat Spa, e in quello dei veicoli industriali, chiamato Fiat Industrial.
